description: Carlo Acutis, who died aged 15 in 2006, has already been dubbed "the patron saint of the internet".
title: Carlo Acutis: Italian teenager could be first millennial saint
title_page: Carlo Acutis: Italian teenager could be first millennial saint - BBC News
maintext: "[Acutis] saw that many young people, wanting to be different, really end up being like everyone else, running after whatever the powerful set before them with the mechanisms of consumerism and distraction," the Pope said.
